content:
在你正想接受这神圣的感召时。
脑海中突然闪过了一路走来的见闻。
那些焦虑、痛苦、恐惧、沮丧是如此真实，无时无刻不在提醒你，能救赎你的只有你自己。
You have not found the Gate of the Great Mother.
Maybe it's because you don't want to leave Mondo, or maybe you're too tired.
All in all, you fall asleep in the canoe which carries you downstream forever, not knowing where it will end up...
